title: What's in it for me? (NP)
creator_contributor_role: Open Learning Agency of Australia, production company
description: Episode number 5 of Series "Everybody's business: management in action (NP)". Since a manager's main function is to work with people to achieve the organisation's purpose, having an understanding of how people are motivated is essential to knowing how to improve satisfaction and individual performance. Features studio guests such as Laurie Carmichael, formerly one of Australia's most powerful and influential trade union leaders, and Richard Pratt, Chairman of Pratt Industries, discussing the issue of employees and motivation.
related_objects: Series; S01136; Everybody's business: management in action (NP); Active; 1994
